hero.subheadline: A reverse-bidding platform connecting car owners, insurance company, car auction and Auto-Club, with trusted transport companies. Post your vehicle, watch the bids compete, and get the lowest price.

features.title: The Smarter Way to Ship
features.subtitle: Our platform revolutionizes car transport by putting you in control. Let companies compete for your business.

postInMinutes.title: Post in Minutes
postInMinutes.description: List your vehicle for transport with just a few detailsâ€”pickup, drop-off, and car specs. It's that simple.

competingBids.title: Competing Bids

lowestBidWins.title: Lowest Bid Wins

anonymousBidding.title: Anonymous Bidding

verifiedTransporters.title: Verified Transporters

aboutUs.title: About BID4TOW
aboutUs.subtitle: Revolutionizing vehicle transportation through innovative bidding technology

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To connect vehicle owners with reliable transporters through a transparent, efficient, and competitive bidding platform that saves time and money for everyone.

community.title: Community First
community.description: Building a trusted network of transporters and vehicle owners

efficiency.title: Maximum Efficiency
efficiency.description: Streamlining the transportation process with smart technology

quality.title: Quality Service
quality.description: Ensuring every shipment meets the highest standards

trust.title: Trust & Safety
trust.description: Creating secure transactions and reliable partnerships

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: BID4TOW was born from a simple observation: vehicle transportation was broken. Vehicle owners struggled to find reliable transporters at fair prices, while quality transporters had difficulty connecting with customers who needed their services.
story.paragraph2: Our founders, experienced in both logistics and technology, saw an opportunity to create a solution that would benefit everyone involved. By implementing a competitive bidding system, we could ensure fair pricing while maintaining high service standards.
story.paragraph3: Today, BID4TOW continues to grow and innovate, bringing more efficiency and transparency to the vehicle transportation industry. We're proud to be the trusted platform connecting thousands of vehicle owners with professional transporters across the country.

cta.title: Ready to Join Our Community?
cta.description: Whether you need to transport a vehicle or you're a transporter looking for more opportunities, we're here to help.

helpCenter.subtitle: Find answers to your questions and get the support you need

safety.title: Safety & Security
safety.subtitle: Your safety is our top priority. Learn about our security features and emergency procedures.

features.title: Platform Safety Features
features.description: Comprehensive safety measures built into our platform

verification.title: Identity Verification
verification.description: All users and transporters undergo thorough verification

emergency.title: Emergency Procedures
emergency.description: What to do in emergency situations

accidents.title: In Case of Accident
accidents.description: Immediate steps to take if an accident occurs

steps.stayWithVehicle: Stay with the vehicle until help arrives

lostVehicle.title: Lost Vehicle Situation
lostVehicle.description: Steps if vehicle is lost or stolen

tips.meetInPerson: Meet transporter in person when possible

tips.takePhotos: Take photos before handover and after delivery
tips.secureBelongings: Remove valuable personal items from vehicle

tips.documentIssues: Document any issues immediately with photos
tips.leaveReview: Leave honest review to help community

contact.title: Contact Safety Team
contact.description: Reach out to our dedicated safety team

support.title: Safety Support
support.description: Report safety concerns or suspicious activity

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about BID4TOW

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Questions about using BID4TOW for the first time

createAccount.question: How do I create an account?
createAccount.answer: Creating an account is simple! Click the 'Sign Up' button on our homepage, fill in your personal information, verify your email address, and you're ready to start using BID4TOW. The whole process takes less than 5 minutes.

freeToUse.question: Is BID4TOW free to use?
freeToUse.answer: Yes, creating an account and browsing requests is completely free. We only charge a small commission fee when a transaction is successfully completed. There are no hidden fees or subscription costs.

vehicleTypes.question: What types of vehicles can be transported?
vehicleTypes.answer: BID4TOW supports all types of vehicles including cars, trucks, motorcycles, SUVs, vans, and even specialty vehicles.

biddingProcess.question: How does the bidding process work?
biddingProcess.answer: After you post a transportation request, verified transporters will bid on your job with their prices. You can review all bids, then select the best offer for your needs else lowest bid will be selected.

vehicleOwners.title: For Vehicle Owners
vehicleOwners.description: Everything you need to know about shipping your vehicle

postRequest.question: How do I post a transportation request?
postRequest.answer: Log into your account, click 'Post Request', fill in details about your vehicle, pickup and delivery locations, preferred dates, and any special requirements. Then submit your request and wait for transporters to bid.

requiredInfo.question: What information do I need to provide?
requiredInfo.answer: Provide vehicle details, pickup and delivery addresses, preferred timeframe, vehicle condition, and any special requirements like enclosed transport or extra insurance.

chooseTransporter.question: How do I choose a transporter?
chooseTransporter.answer: Review all bids carefully, choose the transporter that best fits your budget.

damageDuringTransport.question: What if my vehicle is damaged during transport?
damageDuringTransport.answer: All verified transporters carry insurance coverage. If damage occurs, document it immediately with photos, contact the transporter, and file a claim through their insurance.

transporters.title: For Transporters
transporters.description: Information for transporters looking to join our platform

becomeVerified.question: How do I become a verified transporter?
becomeVerified.answer: Sign up for a transporter account, complete your profile, submit required documents, undergo background verification, and once approved, you can start bidding on transportation requests.

findAndBid.question: How do I find and bid on requests?
findAndBid.answer: Browse available requests in your service area, review request details, submit competitive bids with your pricing.

getPaid.question: When and how do I get paid?
getPaid.answer: Payment is typically released within 24-48 hours after successful delivery and confirmation by the vehicle owner. Funds are held in escrow during transport.

safetyInsurance.title: Safety & Insurance
safetyInsurance.description: Important information about safety and coverage

insured.question: Are transporters insured?
insured.answer: Yes, all verified transporters must maintain valid commercial insurance coverage that meets or exceeds industry standards.

coverage.question: What does the insurance cover?
coverage.answer: Insurance typically covers damage to vehicles during transport, theft, and liability.

fileClaim.question: How do I file an insurance claim?
fileClaim.answer: Document any damage with photos and videos, contact the transporter immediately, and submit a claim to the transporter's insurance company.

safetyMeasures.question: What safety measures are in place?
safetyMeasures.answer: We implement identity verification, background checks, insurance verification, secure payment processing, dispute resolution, and documentation for all transactions.

technicalSupport.title: Technical Support
technicalSupport.description: Help with technical issues and account management

resetPassword.question: I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
resetPassword.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email address, and we'll send you a password reset link.

updateProfile.question: How do I update my profile information?
updateProfile.answer: Log into your account, go to 'Profile', update your information, and save changes.

cantLogin.question: Why can't I log into my account?
cantLogin.answer: Check that you're using the correct email and password, ensure your account is verified, and try again. If issues persist, contact support.

contactSupport.question: How do I contact customer support?
contactSupport.answer: You can reach our support team through the Help Center or email us at support@bid4tow.com. We typically respond within 24 hours.

contact.title: Still Have Questions?
contact.description: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.

support.title: Contact Support
support.description: Get personalized help from our team

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using BID4TOW

points.0: By accessing and using BID4TOW, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.
points.1: If you do not agree to these terms, you must not access or use our services.
points.2: These terms apply to all users, including vehicle owners, transporters, and visitors.
points.3: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time with or without notice.

points.0: BID4TOW is a platform connecting vehicle owners with verified transporters for vehicle transportation services.
points.1: We facilitate the bidding process, payment processing, and communication between parties.
points.2: We do not provide transportation services directly but act as an intermediary platform.
points.3: Our services include user verification and secure payment processing.

points.0: Users must provide accurate and complete information when posting transportation requests.
points.1: Transporters must maintain valid licenses, insurance, and meet all legal requirements.
points.2: All users must communicate professionally and honestly through our platform.
points.3: You must not use our services for illegal activities or fraudulent purposes.

points.0: All payments are processed through our secure payment system with escrow protection.
points.1: Transporters receive payment within 24-48 hours after delivery completion.
points.2: BID4TOW charges a commission fee on successful transactions, detailed in our fee schedule.
points.3: Refunds are subject to our refund policy and the specific terms agreed between parties.

prohibitedActivities.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibitedActivities.description: Actions not allowed on our platform

points.0: Posting false or misleading information about vehicles or transportation requests.
points.1: Attempting to circumvent our payment system or avoid commission fees.
points.2: Using the platform for illegal transportation of stolen vehicles or contraband.
points.3: Creating multiple accounts or attempting to manipulate the bidding system.

points.0: All content on BID4TOW, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is owned by BID4TOW.
points.1: Users may not copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works without permission.
points.2: User-generated content remains the property of the respective users.
points.3: BID4TOW name and logos are trademarks and may not be used without permission.

points.0: We collect and process personal information as described in our Privacy Policy.
points.1: User data is protected using industry-standard encryption and security measures.
points.2: We may share information with transporters when necessary to complete transactions.
points.3: We comply with applicable data protection laws and regulations.
points.4: Users have rights to access, correct, or delete their personal information.

points.0: BID4TOW is not responsible for the actions of transporters or vehicle owners.
points.1: We do not guarantee the quality, safety, or legality of transportation services.
points.2: Our liability is limited to the commission fees paid for our platform services.
points.3: We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.
points.4: Users use our services at their own risk and assume all responsibility.

points.0: Users may terminate their account at any time by contacting customer support.
points.1: BID4TOW may suspend or terminate accounts for violations of these terms.
points.2: Upon termination, all rights and licenses granted to users are immediately revoked.
points.3: Users remain responsible for all obligations incurred before termination.
points.4: We may discontinue services with or without notice at our discretion.

points.0: These terms constitute the entire agreement between users and BID4TOW.
points.1: If any provision is found invalid, remaining terms remain in full effect.
points.2: Our failure to enforce any provision does not waive our right to enforce it later.
points.3: These terms are governed by the laws of the jurisdiction where BID4TOW operates.
points.4: Users waive any right to participate in class action lawsuits against BID4TOW.

contact.title: Questions About These Terms?
contact.description: If you have any questions about our Terms of Service, our legal team is here to help.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.description: Types of data we gather from users

points.0: Personal information: name, email, phone number, and address when you create an account.
points.1: Vehicle details: make, model, year, VIN, and photos when posting transportation requests.
points.2: Payment information: billing details processed securely through our payment partners.
points.3: Usage data: how you interact with our platform, including pages visited and features used.

points.0: To provide and maintain our vehicle transportation platform services.
points.1: To connect vehicle owners with verified transporters for transportation services.
points.2: To process payments and facilitate secure transactions between parties.
points.3: To communicate with you about your requests, bids, and account activities.

points.0: All data is encrypted using industry-standard SSL/TLS protocols.
points.1: We implement strict access controls and authentication systems.
points.2: Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments are conducted.
points.3: We comply with GDPR and other applicable data protection regulations.

points.0: Access: Request a copy of your personal data we hold about you.
points.1: Correction: Update or correct inaccurate personal information.
points.2: Deletion: Request removal of your personal data when no longer needed.
points.3: Portability: Request transfer of your data to another service provider.

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.description: When and how we share your data

points.0: With transporters when you accept their bid for vehicle transportation.
points.1: With payment processors to facilitate secure transactions.
points.2: With legal authorities when required by law or court order.
points.3: We never sell your personal information to third parties for marketing.

points.0: Your data may be processed and stored in secure servers outside your country.
points.1: We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for international transfers.
points.2: All international transfers comply with applicable data protection laws.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.description: How long we keep your information

points.0: We retain personal data only as long as necessary for our services.
points.1: Account data is kept for legal compliance and dispute resolution purposes.
points.2: You can request deletion of your account and associated personal data at any time.

points.0: Our services are not intended for children under 18 years of age.
points.1: We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18.
points.2: If we learn we have collected such information, we will delete it promptly.

points.0: We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect our practices.
points.1: Significant changes will be communicated through email or platform notifications.
points.2: Your continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of any changes.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: How to reach us about privacy matters

points.0: Email: privacy@bid4tow.com for privacy-related inquiries.
points.1: Address: Our legal address is available in the Terms of Service.
points.2: Response time: We typically respond to privacy inquiries within 30 days.
points.3: Complaints: You have the right to file complaints with data protection authorities.

contact.title: Questions About Your Privacy?
contact.description: If you have questions about our privacy practices, we're here to help.

privacy.title: Privacy Team
privacy.description: Get help with data protection and privacy rights
